p: Maleopimaric acid-modified polyester polyol aqueous dispersion can be prepared from maleopimaric acid, adipic acid, isophtalic acid, 5-sulfoisophtalic acid, neopentyl glycol and trimethylolpropane, according to Scheme 65, prior to dissolving/dispersing in water and diethylene glycol monoethyl ether acetate as a cosolvent [ 91]. It can be applied in two-component waterborne polyurethane materials and coatings [ 110] showing improved thermal stability, hardness and resistances to ethanol and water [ 91, 110].
